description: This file defines a React component called AddStaffModal, which provides a user interface modal for adding new staff members. It manages form states, validation, submission handling, and renders UI elements such as input fields, select dropdowns, and confirmation messages.

methods.name: resetForm
methods.description: Resets all form fields and error/success states, called when modal closes or form resets.

methods.name: handleOpenChange
methods.description: Handles opening and closing of the modal, resetting form on close.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs validation, invokes onSubmit callback, manages success/error states.
